long_description: The Nathan Trail Mix hydration waistpack carries dual 10 fl. oz. flasks of energy gel, so you won't fade before the finish line. Molded holsters hold 2 Nutrition Flasks, which carry 10 fl. oz. of your favorite energy gel without the hassle of individual packages. Single zippered pocket is great for stashing your keys, ID and lip balm; stretch-mesh outer pocket holds quick-access items. Back of pack is lined with moisture-wicking air mesh to keep you comfortable during exertion. Adjustable belt stretches slightly to enhance breathability, fit and heat dispersion; fits waists measuring 26 - 42 in.
short_description: The Nathan Trail Mix hydration waistpack carries dual 10 fl. oz. flasks of energy gel, so you won't fade before the finish line.
